title: Villager?s Town
briefDescription: From a simple village into a detailed town, Villagers Town has everything you need for survival and it is not just a village, it is ...

crawledImageUrls.text:
From a simple village into a detailed town, Villagers Town has everything you need for survival and it is not just a village, it is a town. Just explore and see the beauty of the town.
What?s inside of the Villagers Town?
Villagers Town has everything you need for survival. There has fishing area, farming area, crafting area, smelting area, repairing area and so much more. In this town, you can see the hospital, church, bank, bakery, school, camping area and more. You can live in the hobbit holes and some houses that you have started to survive.
How many months did you build this town?
I took 3 months to build this town. So, explore it and see all of my hardworks.
What can I do in this world?
You have so many to do in that world. You can start your own survival and take so many adventures, even you can play hide and seek by just putting something. And then, play PvP with your friends. So, there has lot of stuffs to do in this world. So, thanks for downloading and have enjoyed.

Another upper view

title: Radiation City
briefDescription: Get ready for a radioactive adventure, inspired by Atypical Games' game: Radiation City mobile. Go into the world, explore towns and cities, activate towers & destroy ...

crawledImageUrls.text:
Get ready for a radioactive adventure, inspired by Atypical Games? game: Radiation City mobile. Go into the world, explore towns and cities, activate towers & destroy danger.
You start in an accident (as in the original story), and you start your journey to different places in the map.
You?re in a large area with stone walls. where there?re different towns & cities with radioactive towers, that you have to activate with codes to complete your greatest mission.

You will have to be very careful with the creatures that will appear at night. To do this, loot buildings and houses with weapons and armor, (make sure to find each code in the chests to activate the towers!).
The military zone has much-needed equipment!

title: World at War
briefDescription: It?s 2026 and the U.S Launched a nuclear Missile that was going to hit on Germany but it had malfunctioned and hit Canada Instead, ...

crawledImageUrls.text:
It?s 2026 and the U.S Launched a nuclear Missile that was going to hit on Germany but it had malfunctioned and hit Canada Instead, Killed over 1m. Canada?s Prime minister Juan Moil (not a real person) Has started a war with the US Because of the bomb, the bomb is 10x more dangerous and more powerful than 3 tsar bombs. But with no hesitation, The US Won. Parts of Canada turned into territories.
It?s now 2039, The war ended, but you?re the only Alive Canadian but your under the US military, No one knows that you are still alive and right under their base, When you come out of your cave you can see a missile, and 30 other soldiers. You run back to your home quickly. Hide Canada?s flag and hide under your bed. A soldier comes in, confused that he saw someone but no one is there. He gets out and no one else comes in, you put back the flag and sleep?.
(V3)-
after hiding in your home for 3 days a American Soldier finds you, you beg him to not send you in. He didn?t send you in but disguised you as an American soldier, He gives you a military personnel suit so the other military soldiers won?t shoot you.
The military soldier covers the hole you made when trying to get out of your home that caved in 3 weeks ago?.
(BACKSTORY)-
On April 14th, 2024. Germany has stopped being a NATO member because USA, Canada, etc, Start to make Powerful and more advanced Military vehicles and Weapons, Mocking Germany that they (Germany) have been starting to make weapons that were from late 2010 in 2024. Germany takes the Joke as a threat to set war on them, Germany send 20+ fighter planes/jets with a capacity of 10 bombs /per jet, Germany still not knowing that The teasing wasn?t a threat. Many cities of the USA have been destroyed. 1-2 years later USA Sets war on Germany, the NATO members Including Canada, Russia, etc, Will not be Joining because they?re still going to follow the rules of the NATO group. The USA Have set their first missile but it hit the Atlantic, not knowing that their missiles has been hacked by one of the most wanted criminals in the USA, Them (USA) now thinking it was a faulty motherboard on the missile. Ok the second launch the missile hit Canada and killing millions, and left a huge crater on the southern part of Canada (including Toronto and other major cities), Canada now sets war on the US leaving the NATO group as the USA did. But With no hesitation the USA won.

title: The Nightmare (Short Horror) (Adventure)
briefDescription: You just came from a long day at school and when on the walk to home you saw a stranger that looked suspicious, you went ...

crawledImageUrls.text:
You just came from a long day at school and when on the walk to home you saw a stranger that looked suspicious, you went to your bed and when that stranger got into your mind; you began to sleep and the nightmare about that stranger began. Can you get through the nightmare in time or will you have that nightmare for ever?
Credits to everyone and everything for some sounds and inspiration for their horror maps
Sorry if this map is bad: 1. I made it on mobile. 2. I?m not great at making horror maps since I don?t do it often. Also this is my first horror map, or my first map that got published properly.
This world is about you, and a stranger in your nightmare and you thought about that stranger just before you went to sleep and spooky stuff went in that nightmare about him.

title: Escape From The Mind [Horror]
briefDescription: Escape From The Mind is a new level of horror. In this map, Herobrine has captured you and entered your mind to terrorize you. Your ...

crawledImageUrls.text: Escape From The Mind is a new level of horror. In this map, Herobrine has captured you and entered your mind to terrorize you. Your goal in this map is to escape from your mind by finding secrets as well as the hidden lore. Will you find a way to escape and beat Herobrine?

WARNING: This map has lots of jumpscares and flashing images!
Explore the map and find a way to escape
Look in chests for items you can use to help you
Find stone brick walls with a gold speck to find hidden secrets and useful items
And remember, he is always watching

title: Captive Minecraft
briefDescription: Most of you should know what Captive Minecraft is but for those who don't it is a game where you are stuck in a 1 x 1 ...

crawledImageUrls.text:
Most of you should know what Captive Minecraft is but for those who don?t it is a game where you are stuck in a 1 x 1 and the only way to expand it is to complete an achievement. Once you complete every achievement you will then be set free from your prison.
There are a few structures you can find underground as well as 2 custom enemies.
There is an ?Achievement Book? that you will get once you start the map that will help aid you in your captivity.
This map is multiplayer friendly so join and invite your friends!

title: Slendrina: The Cellar 3 [Horror] [Adventure]
briefDescription: The Final Cellar of Slendrina is here!But now she's prepared for your next move and become so angry. You must escape from her evilness ...

crawledImageUrls.text:
The Final Cellar of Slendrina is here!
But now she?s prepared for your next move and become so angry. You must escape from her evilness and not let Slendrina kill you. But can you escape? Can you fight your fears? Are you brave enough to play this map? Well, let?s see.
The final cellar of slendrina is now on Minecraft! If you want to download the other cellar you can find them in this website!
+ How to play?
? Collect keys to unlock locked doors
? Find 8 old missing books and run to the exit door to escape
? Turn around as soon as you see Slendrina otherwise the game is over
+ Game Settings:
? Gamemode = Adventure
? Difficulty = Any
? Show coordinates = False/Off
? In game player names = False/Off
? Hide hand = True/On
+ Game Rules!
? If possible please avoid jumping and looking directly upward or downward this thing can cause glitch
? Do not place or destroy any blocks until the game finished
Multiplayer Compatible?
Well, I?m not sure about this but If you want to play this map with your friends then go ahead but I?m not recommending it, cause like the other cellar this map has also bugs like the other cellar, example: Light glitching and Slendrina glitching, we also tested it to play in multiplayer and its working fine but its less scary,
Watch my trailer here:
Explore the dark cellar
Collect keys
And unlock locked doors
Collect books and run to the exit door to escape

title: Alien Isolation (First Half)
briefDescription: A detailed fan-made Minecraft adventure-Map based on the game 'Alien Isolation' by SEGA etc.Because of true to detailed locations and lighting, ambient sound and ...

crawledImageUrls.text:
A detailed fan-made Minecraft adventure-Map based on the game ?Alien Isolation? by SEGA etc.
Because of true to detailed locations and lighting, ambient sound and tense storyline, this world provides a good recreation of the actual game.
For Minecraft Bedrock edition on mobile devices (like a mobile version of Alien Isolation:) )
IMPORTANT: The map doesn?t seem to work on x-box right now. You could try it out anyways, if you have knowledge about how to install mc maps on your own.
Additional Informations:
Inventar:
During the storyline you will also get:
Help:
You can try different Playthroughs:
f.e. reaching the fright lift in Gemini-Exoplanet-Solutions without killing anyone
Additionally there are some hidden actions:
f.e. After saving in the Coolant Floor (Medical facility) take the elevator back to San Christobal and check for some people left (Sedation Ward??!)
Maybe I will add an update with the added Project KG 348 to bring this half to an acceptable end at some point!
Good luck and entertainment!

title: Beyond the Portal (Find the Button) [HUGE UPDATE!]
briefDescription: This is the Beyond the Portal: Find the Buttonby alienboyThis is a find the button map which celebrates the release of the all new 1.16 Nether ...

crawledImageUrls.text:
This is the Beyond the Portal: Find the Button
by alienboy
This is a find the button map which celebrates the release of the all new 1.16 Nether Update that launched earlier this June!

The map currently consists of 10 stages with a goal of 100 stages in it?s final update! But that as I?m sure you can guess is quite the distance away and will take a lot of work.
It?s because of this that any and all suggestions for stages are very much appreciated and any that make it into an update of this map will be credited so get commenting!
Updates will be frequent so stay tuned!
INTRODUCING: TROPHIES (WITH CUSTOM TEXTURES) and the OFFICIAL finished first 10 stage release!

Stages currently in-game include:
1. The Beginning of the End
2. Infected Forest
3. A Time Before Change
4. A Slow Souly Demise
5. The Not Cobble Nether Bridges
6. The Ne-end-er Glitch
7. Ancient Debris Mines
8. The Fungi Sanctuary
9. Basalt Delta Royalty
10. Strider Stables
With more coming very soon!
Should I make a guide video to this map?

title: EC Parkour
briefDescription: A advanced Parkour map that is playable with 30 players , without any pack to download and without any lag possible . We added custom death messages , deaths ...

crawledImageUrls.text:
A advanced Parkour map that is playable with 30 players , without any pack to download and without any lag possible . We added custom death messages , deaths counter and you don?t have to click re-spawn button because you re-spawn automatically .
What is this ?

This is a ultimate multiplayer map made for parkour with smart system boosted by BOT12
How to play ?

The game is playable SinglePlayer and Multiplayer , You can play with all your friends with doing /setmaxplayers 30 .
Once you?re ready to play open the chest and move the item to any direction and you will get teleported to the begging of the map .
You will have a jump boost item every 30 seconds to use it you need to drop it and it will effect all players that in 2*3*3 area by Jump boost III for 5 seconds .
When you fall (miss a jump) You won?t lose any booster but you will get teleported automatically to the last checkpoint .
You need to finish the map first without dying 50 times .
The map is on difficulty normal from the beginning to the end .
Is it limit play ?

Well It?s unlimited for playing .
Can i use a texture pack ?

Yes You can use any texture pack that doesn?t change the sounds .
What is the version of the map ?

title: Monster Dungeon [WIP]
briefDescription: This map is a rouge like dungeon crawler themed world, something that Minecraft seems to not have. Venture through different dungeons and castles for a ...

crawledImageUrls.text:
This map is a rouge like dungeon crawler themed world, something that Minecraft seems to not have. Venture through different dungeons and castles for a high intensity battles with modded mobs.
This World will continue too and is using CodanRaigen21?s Carnage add-on, so all credit to him for the custom mobs.
When entering a room you must clear it before moving onto the next one. Altars with roses around them are Respawn Pedestals, to activated them push the button to set your spawn point.
I barely started to work on this so there will be bugs, sorry and contact me for any issues.
